nodes.text: The K-222 Aero-Interceptor was an aircraft manufactured by zZip Defense Concepts.

A 13-meter-long repulsorlift vehicle, it required a single pilot. With a flight ceiling of 150 kilometers, it could achieve 2,600 kilometers per hour. The K-222 boasted a forward fire-linked double laser cannon mounted on the wingtips, and a concussion missile launcher with a magazine of six concussion missile. It was nicknamed the "triple deuce."
Two of these ships were tasked to shoot down Jahan Cross when he tried to flee Etti IV.
